desc.message: Drag URL to open at Back/Front, Before/After; Drag text to 4 directions to search by using different search-engines.

se_empty_alert.message: Search query could NOT be empty

se_no_s_alert.message: There is NO '%s' in the search query ?

se_not_url_alert.message: Search query is NOT a valid URL ?

feedback_h4.message: Do you need more dragging to search zones ?

url_legend.message: Drag URL/Text-Link to Open in a New Tab

url_helper_p.message:
• To open a Text-based-Link, just roughly select the text as long as the URL included.
    • i.e. Select then drag & drop text : The domain google.com was registered will open google.com as well.
  • Press ESC to cancel your drag.

search_helper_p.message:
• Select Yours... to add your favorite search engine.
    • You can copy the search URL from Chrome's search engines.
    • To add a new search engine, insert %s in the URL where the search terms should appear.
  • Press ESC to cancel your drag.

selected_mode_2_label.message: Drag Up to FE, Down to BE NOT in Search Mode

index_mode_2_label.message: Drag Right to After, Left to Before NOT in Search Mode
